Mingle controllers v1.3
  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellSet
    This Controller can be imagined as a simple spreadsheet: it is an arbitrary set of cells and every cell can contain a value or a formula.
    Cells have a name to refer to them (a cell is the equivalent to a variable in traditional languages).
    Control
    Change Daikin Emura AC state.
    ControllerBase
    This is the base class for controllers written in Java language.
    DataBase
    This Controller initializes a SQL DataBase Server using JDBC and sends SQL commands to it.
    DMX512
    This Controller
    Excel
    This Controller writes values to a file using MS Excel format.
    File  
    HttpClient  
    IModbusClient
    Mingle MQTT clients are always asynchronous.
    IModbusClient.Listener  
    IMqttClient
    Mingle MQTT clients are always asynchronous.
    IMqttClient.Listener  
    IMqttClient.Message  
    IPin  
    Kronos
    A Linux Cron style Controller.
    LednetWifi5Ch
    http://www.ledenet.com/products/smart-wifi-led-controller-5-channels-control-4a5ch-cwww-rgb-rgbw-rgbww-led-light-timer-music-group-sync-controller/ Smart WiFi LED Controller 5 Channels Control 4A5CH CW/WW RGB RGBW RGBWW LED light.
    LightCtrlBase  
    ModbusTcpClient4J2mod
    This class uses the J2mod lib by Steve O'Hara to manage a ModBus.
    ModbusTcpClientWrapper
    https://sourceforge.net/projects/jamod/ https://github.com/steveohara/j2mod https://github.com/steveohara/j2mod/wiki/Using-j2mod-to-send-from-a-Slave https://sourceforge.net/projects/jlibmodbus/ https://github.com/digitalpetri/modbus
    MqttClientWrapper
    This is the class that is used in Une: all others in this package are accessory classes (needed to make things easy to read and manage and more reusable).
    OutputStream
    This Controller send device's value to terminal (standard output).
    RGBW2
    This Controller
    RPiGpioPin
    Instances of this class represents one single Raspberry Pi GPIO Pin.
    Sensors
    Manage Sensors providing following current values: temperature inside, temperature outside and humidity inside.
    SocketClient
    A controller to manage client plain-old Sockets and WebSockets.
    SunFreeTTS
    This Controller send device's value to Sun FreeTTS.

    See note at ControllerBase API doc.
    SystemClock
    This Controller periodically informs about the time elapsed since ExEn started.
    SystemMetrics
    This class provides basic information about usage in: RAM, Disks and CPU.
    SystemMonitor  
    Telegram
    This Controller send device's value to: a Telegram-Bot.
    Test  
    WeatherOpenMeteo
    This Controller retrieves weather information from OpenMeteo web service.
    Maximum allowed forecast is 1 week.
